job.title: Junior Software Engineer
job.description:
Job Description: &nbsp;Looking for a talented and self-motivated Software Engineer. The ideal candidate will have experience developing and maintaining software in C++ and/or C#, ideally for machine controls and novel electro-mechanical systems.   Job Duties:  - Design, implement and debug C++ and C# code for machine controls and HMI (GUI), utilities and backend software.   
  - Design, implement and debug PLC and/or motion controller code.   
  - Implement test and simulation code. Execute test plans and write test reports.   
  - Support, maintain, and document software functionality.   
   Skills/Qualifications:&nbsp;Required:   - Object-oriented Design and Development (OOD).   
  - Experience with C++/C#.   
  - Experience with Winforms and/or WPF development in Microsoft Visual Studio (or equivalent; Qt/Java).   
  - Experience with software configuration management and source control systems (e.g. Mercurial or Git).   
  - Must be able to work in a collaborative environment.   
  - Strong analytical and communication skills.   
&nbsp;Strongly Desired:   - Experience with or aptitude towards software that controls and interfaces to hardware (analog and digital I/O).   
  - Experience or understanding of Database systems, such as Microsoft SQL or similar.   
  - Familiar with real-time concepts.   
  - Background in, or solid understanding of Mechatronics and interfacing concepts.   
  - Experience with additive Manufacturing / 3D Printing.   
&nbsp;Education/Experience:Required:   - B.S. degree in Software, Physics, Mechanical, Electrical, or related.&nbsp; 0+ years of experience developing software.   
Desired:   - M.S. degree preferred   
&nbsp;Travel:The expectation is up to 15%&nbsp;Relocation:The relocation package is negotiable.
